metadata.Title: CVE-2016-4232 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Adobe Flash Player before 18.0.0.366 and 19.x through 22.x before22.0.0.209 on Windows and OS X and before 11.2.202.632 on Linux allowsattackers to obtain sensitive information from process memory viaunspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4232` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 11.2.202.632ubuntu0.16.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 11.2.202.632ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.2.202.632ubuntu0.16.04.1').
